title: Angler boots

properties.name: description
properties.value: The angler boots are obtained from aerial fishing by purchasing it from Alry the Angler for a price of 100 Molch pearls or acquired randomly from completing a game of Fishing Trawler. The boots grant 0.2% bonus Fishing experience. A fishing level of 34 is required to wear it. The Angler boots are 1 of 4 pieces of the Angler's outfit.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Fishing boots
Angler boots

Item ID13261

The angler boots are obtained from aerial fishing by purchasing it from Alry the Angler for a price of 100 Molch pearls or acquired randomly from completing a game of Fishing Trawler. The boots grant 0.2% bonus Fishing experience. A fishing level of 34 is required to wear it. The Angler boots are 1 of 4 pieces of the Angler's outfit.

When a player receives it from the Fishing Trawler minigame, a message in the chat box states The luck of the sea is in today. You spot a piece of fishing gear caught up in the netting!

This item can be stored in the armour case of a costume room, as part of the Angler outfit set. Ultimate Ironmen will be unable to retrieve individual pieces until the full set is stored.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
31 January 2019
(update)

The item's value was increased from 30 to 100.

12 April 2018
(update)

The weight of the angler boots was reduced from 9 to 1 kg.

Gallery[edit | edit source]

  • Initial model for the angler's outfit, named the "trawler suit", by Mod Alfred.

  • Reworked model for the outfit after player feedback.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The examine text is a reference to Where's Wally?, alongside a pun referencing Wellington boots.

[[File:Angler boots detail.png|120px|left]]
The '''angler boots''' are obtained from [[aerial fishing]] by purchasing it from [[Alry the Angler]] for a price of 100 [[Molch pearl|Molch pearls]] '''or''' acquired randomly from completing a game of [[Fishing Trawler]]. The boots grant 0.2% bonus [[Fishing]] [[experience]]. A fishing level of 34 is required to wear it. The Angler boots are 1 of 4 pieces of the [[Angler's outfit]].

When a player receives it from the Fishing Trawler minigame, a message in the chat box states ''{{Colour|#FF0000|The luck of the sea is in today. You spot a piece of fishing gear caught up in the netting!}}''
